# init(controller:snapshotData:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Game Controller ](/documentation/gamecontroller)

- [ GCMicroGamepadSnapshot ](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcmicrogamepadsnapshot)

- [ init(controller:snapshotData:) ](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:))

- [ GCMicroGamepadSnapshot ](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcmicrogamepadsnapshot)

-  init(controller:snapshotData:) 

Initializer# init(controller:snapshotData:)

iOS 9.0–13.0DeprecatediPadOS 9.0–13.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedmacOS 10.11–10.15DeprecatedtvOS 9.0–13.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–1.0Deprecated

```
init(
    controller: GCController,
    snapshotData data: Data
)
```

Deprecated

Use the [`withMicroGamepad()`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gccontroller/withmicrogamepad()) method instead.

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:)#parameters)

`controller`The controller to associate the snapshot with.

`data`A data object that contains snapshot data.

## [Return Value](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:)#return-value)

A new snapshot object.

## [Discussion](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:)#Discussion)

The data format for a snapshot is private. Your snapshot object should only be created from flattened data previously obtained from a snapshot.

## [See Also](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:)#see-also)

### [Converting Between Snapshots and Data Objects](/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepadSnapshot/init(controller:snapshotData:)#Converting-Between-Snapshots-and-Data-Objects)

[`init(snapshotData: Data)`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcmicrogamepadsnapshot/init(snapshotdata:))Initializes a snapshot object with the flattened data representation obtained from another snapshot.Deprecated[`var snapshotData: Data`](/documentation/gamecontroller/gcmicrogamepadsnapshot/snapshotdata)The flattened control input values for the snapshot.Deprecated
